title: V-OS (MacOS-style Portfolio)
description: A specialized portfolio engineered as a functional Operating System. Built with React.js, simulating a macOS environment.

title: DOM Visual Editor
description: A lightweight, DOM-based design tool built entirely in Vanilla JavaScript. Features drag-and-drop, resizing, layering, styling, LocalStorage support, and JSON/HTML export.

title: Productivity Dashboard
description: A distraction-free, productivity dashboard built with vanilla JS. Features local-first data persistence, todo list, daily planner, pomodoro timer, quote and habit tracker.

title: Anchor Nav Component
description: A minimal, fluid navigation menu built with the CSS Anchor Positioning API and mix-blend-mode for dynamic color inversion.
